name: CodeBreaker (Enma Ai)
description:
Hello Hacker!

Execute the visual novel's goal by playing 3 levels of block breaking game and finding the codes needed. Keep it in mind that this is not a traditional block breaker game. You don't have to break all the blocks but need to find the important ones instead.

Hacking can be stressful, they can find you and time is passing very quickly when you are in a hurry...

Go, Hacker! You can SMASH it!
